data.name: Amidst Prospering Markets
data.description: An exquisitely-furnished mercantile district that pays homage to the layout of Sumeru City's streets and its Grand Bazaar. Fresh fruits, delectable dishes, and all manner of lifestyle goods may be found at the stalls here. A few rounds around the area, and you will find a unique ambience one feels when stepping foot into a bustling market.\nThey say that the shops and stalls on either side of Sumeru's streets have been modified according to specific rules that are the product of some Akademiya research, such that they can provide holistic service with the minimum possible management difficulty and acreage used.

text.text: Aha, now this is my kind of environment. And look at this discerning arrangement of shops.
I'm impressed, my young apprentice. Perhaps you're more of a business genius than I realized?
The next time that I, the renowned Lord Sangemah Bay, am negotiating a major business deal, make sure you come along.
Do you think I could open a stall here? I can offer a few different services... translating ancient texts, deciphering puzzles, selling miniature mechanism models...
Hmm... Sounds like a perfect retirement plan... Hmph, forget it then!
My body and mind are still in prime condition! Retirement? Maybe in another hundred years!
